trans-unit.source: Handle to the desktop. This desktop must be associated with the current window station for the process.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_SwitchDesktop() function fails if the desktop belongs to an invisible window station. This function

trans-unit.source: also fails when called from a process that is associated with a secured desktop such as the WinLogon and ScreenSaver
